name: Burst (itch) (mcstuber)
description:
Burst is a 2d wave based shmup. In Burst you play as 'Burst' a lone bubble trying to survive in a multi-verse of other bubbles. 'Burst' has to pop enemy bubbles in order  to keep intact and survive in the Multi-Verse. Many a Universe depend on 'Burst' to do so..

Help 'Burst' survive and restore order in the Multi-Verse.

1920x1080 or higher recommended for Desktop resolution. (haven't figured out the webGL auto-scaling yet, maybe next jam)
